Summary: Fast shooting star type ufo , silver and reflecting alot of light.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Killeen
There was one other sighting in Killeen on or around October 8th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy daughter was walking outside of her school after a school volleyball game, and she showed me a picture of the 4 ufos in the sky. they were metalic-silver and refelcted alot of light just like stars. but you know shooting stars just dont stop and hover for a few seconds and continue the same flight path(:. she noticed the object because the amount of light it was reflecting and there were four of them clearly visable to the human eye. she first thought that they were shooting stars or meteors but like i said the object had stopped and hovered for a few seconds and then began again and she said this happened about twice. apparently her first reaction, being a teen was to take a picture haha. but after 2 minutes she said the objects\ufos had dissappared.
